remarks: Value of the partial isomorphism B for a lattice ` K ` .  (Contributed by NM, 24-Feb-2014.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
dibval3.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
dibval3.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
dibval3.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dibval3.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
dibval3.r $e |- R = ( ( trL ` K ) ` W ) $.
dibval3.o $e |- .0. = ( g e. T |-> ( _I |` B ) ) $.
dibval3.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoB ` K ) ` W ) $.
dibval3N $p |- ( ( ( K e. V /\ W e. H ) /\ ( X e. B /\ X .<_ W ) ) -> ( I ` X ) = ( { f e. T | ( R ` f ) .<_ X } X. { .0. } ) ) $.
$d K f $.
$d K g $.
$d T f $.
$d W f $.
$d W g $.
$d X f $.
